title: Testing KDP Keywords From Creative Fabrica + Revealing 2 Profitable KDP Niches #kdp   #kdpkeywords

tactics.name: Creative Fabrica Latest KDP Interiors
tactics.description: Use Creative Fabrica's KDP Interiors sorted by latest uploads to discover new niches and avoid saturated markets.
steps: Navigate to Creative Fabrica's KDP Interiors section
Sort results by 'latest' instead of popularity
Filter for under-saturated niches with low competition
caveats: Some niches may lack sufficient data for validation
source_quotes: Sort by the latest and you will have results of endless pages of the most updated KDP Interiors

tactics.name: competition_filtering
tactics.description: Filter keywords by competition level to identify low-competition niches for KDP.
steps: Open keyword data in Google Sheets
Cross-check niche scores and search volumes
caveats: Keywords require regular updates due to market shifts
source_quotes: we're going to filter based on the competition

heuristics.name: Low Review Niche Boost
heuristics.condition: If a niche has low review counts, it may indicate undersaturation
source_quotes: Diamond painting logbook had low results until refined with keywords

heuristics.name: high_niche_score_boost
heuristics.condition: If niche score exceeds 40, prioritize for KDP

claims.statement: Creative Fabrica's KDP Interiors can reveal profitable niches through recent uploads
source_quotes: This is the majority of the reason why sellers take advantage of a new Niche

claims.statement: KDP niches with high niche scores (47+) show strong market potential

niche_patterns.example: Diamond painting enthusiasts + tracking progress + budget constraints
niche_patterns.description: Combine specific identities with problem-solving needs in constrained environments
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances niche specificity with practicality for KDP audiences
source_quotes: Diamond painting Journal had a keyword score of 44 with 1072 results

niche_patterns.description: Target specific pain points with actionable solutions
niche_patterns.why_it_works: High search volume paired with low competition
source_quotes: addiction recovery journal gave us 1000 search volume
